about: Zoho CRM is a cloud-based customer relationship management platform that helps businesses manage sales, marketing, and customer support in a single system.

faqs.a: Zoho CRM is a cloud-based platform for managing sales, marketing, and customer relationships.
Zoho CRM is used by startups, SMBs, and enterprises to manage leads and automate sales.

faqs.q: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.a: Yes, Zoho CRM offers a 15-day free trial and a free plan for up to 3 users.
Yes, Zoho CRM includes workflow automation and email automation.
Zoho CRM integrates with Gmail, Microsoft 365, WhatsApp, Slack and more.

faqs.q: Do you have an AI assistant?
faqs.a: Yes, Zoho CRM includes Zia, an AI assistant for predictions and insights.
